tool_description: A scraper API for YouTube search and download. Get videos, subtitles, comments without age or region limits (proxy URL supported).
title: YouTube Media Downloader

api_list.name: Search for Channels
api_list.description: This endpoint searches for YouTube channels. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Keyword for search.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to `relevance`.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `keyword` and `sortBy` will be ignored.

api_list.name: Get Channel Details
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches details of a YouTube channel.

required_parameters.name: channelId
required_parameters.description: Channel ID, custom URL name or handle. `@` is required as a prefix for a channel handle.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

api_list.name: List Post Comments
api_list.description: This endpoint lists comments of a YouTube community post. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `postId` and `sortBy` will be ignored.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to `top`.

api_list.name: List Video Comments
api_list.description: This endpoint lists comments of a YouTube video. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: videoId
optional_parameters.description: YouTube video id. The value of `v` in YouTube player URL query parameters.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `videoId` and `sortBy` will be ignored.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to `top`.

api_list.name: List Channel Videos/Shorts/Live
api_list.description: This endpoint lists videos, shorts or live streams of a YouTube channel. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to `newest`. `oldest` is only applicable if `type` is not `shorts`.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Video type. Defaults to `videos`.

optional_parameters.name: channelId
optional_parameters.description: Channel ID, custom URL name or handle. `@` is required as a prefix for a channel handle.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `channelId`, `type` and `sortBy` will be ignored.

api_list.name: List Channel Playlists/Releases/Podcasts
api_list.description: This endpoint lists playlists, releases or podcasts of a YouTube channel. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to `dateAdded`.

optional_parameters.name: channelId
optional_parameters.description: Channel ID, custom URL name or handle. `@` is required as a prefix for a channel handle.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `channelId`, `type` and `sortBy` will be ignored.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
* `playlists` - **Playlists** (default value)
* `releases` - **Releases** (`sortBy` will be omitted)
* `podcasts` - **Podcasts** (`sortBy` will be omitted)
* ~~`created`~~ - Deprecated. An alias for `playlists`.
* ~~`album`~~ - Deprecated. An alias for `releases`.

api_list.name: Search for Channel Videos and Playlists
api_list.description: This endpoint searches for videos and playlists in a YouTube Channel. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `channelId` and `keyword` will be ignored.

optional_parameters.name: channelId
optional_parameters.description: Channel ID, custom URL name or handle. `@` is required as a prefix for a channel handle.

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Keyword for search.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

api_list.name: List Featured Channels
api_list.description: This endpoint lists subscribed or featured channels of a YouTube channel. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: channelId
optional_parameters.description: Channel ID, custom URL name or handle. `@` is required as a prefix for a channel handle.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `channelId` and `type` will be ignored.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
* `subscribed` - **Subscriptions** (default value)
* `featured` - **Featured Channels**

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

api_list.name: List Channel Posts (Poll/Video/Image)
api_list.description: This endpoint lists poll, video, or image posts of a YouTube channel. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

optional_parameters.name: channelId
optional_parameters.description: Channel ID, custom URL name or handle. `@` is required as a prefix for a channel handle.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `channelId` will be ignored.

api_list.name: List Hashtag Videos
api_list.description: This endpoint lists YouTube videos related to the hashtag. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `tag` and `type` will be ignored.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Video type. Defaults to `all`.

optional_parameters.name: tag
optional_parameters.description: A hashtag without `#`.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

api_list.name: Get Post Details
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches details of a YouTube community post.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

api_list.name: List Playlist Videos
api_list.description: This endpoint lists **available** videos of a YouTube playlist (unavailable ones won't be listed by YouTube). Pagination scraping is supported. Thumbnails won't be blurred by age safety.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `playlistId` will be ignored.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Default to be `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

api_list.name: Get Playlist Details
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches details of a YouTube playlist (user created playlist, album or radio playlist).

optional_parameters.name: videos
optional_parameters.description: Whether to list the first page of videos. Default to be `true`.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

api_list.name: Search for Playlists
api_list.description: This endpoint searches for YouTube playlists. Pagination scraping is supported. Thumbnails will not be blurred by age safety.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `keyword` and `sortBy` will be ignored.

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Keyword for search.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to `relevance`.

api_list.name: Search for Videos (Movies)
api_list.description: This endpoint searches for YouTube videos (movies) with optional filters. Pagination scraping is supported. Thumbnails will not be blurred by age safety.

optional_parameters.name: movie
optional_parameters.description: Search for movies only. Defaults to `false`.

optional_parameters.name: duration
optional_parameters.description:
* `all` - **No duration limit** (default value)
* `short` - **Under 4 minutes**
* `medium` - **4 - 20 minutes**
* `long` - **Over 20 minutes**

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to `relevance`.

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Keyword for search.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

optional_parameters.name: uploadDate
optional_parameters.description: Upload date. Defaults to `all`.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `keyword`, `movie`, `uploadDate`, `duration` and `sortBy` will be ignored.

api_list.name: List Autocomplete Suggestions
api_list.description: This endpoint lists autocomplete predictions depending on the keyword.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: Region code (ISO 3166 alpha-2) for localized results. Defaults to `US`.

api_list.name: List Related Videos and Playlists
api_list.description: This endpoint lists related videos and playlists of a YouTube video. Pagination scraping is supported. It's recommended to get the first page by calling `Video > Get Video Details`, and then get subsequent pages here.

optional_parameters.name: videoId
optional_parameters.description: YouTube video id. The value of `v` in YouTube player URL query parameters.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `videoId` will be ignored.

api_list.name: Get Video Details
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches full details of a YouTube video, including URLs of videos, audios, thumbnails and subtitles as well as related videos and playlists.

required_parameters.name: videoId
required_parameters.description: YouTube video id. The value of `v` in YouTube player URL query parameters.

optional_parameters.name: related
optional_parameters.description: Whether to get information of related videos and playlists. Defaults to `true`.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to `en-US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `en-US`.

optional_parameters.name: audios
optional_parameters.description: Whether to get audio URLs. Defaults to `true`.

optional_parameters.name: videos
optional_parameters.description: Whether to get video URLs. Defaults to `true`.

optional_parameters.name: subtitles
optional_parameters.description: Whether to get subtitle URLs. Defaults to `true`.

api_list.name: Translate, Convert, Download Subtitle
api_list.description: This endpoint lets you translate, convert and download a subtitle of a YouTube video. Before doing this, please call endpoint `Video > Get Video Details` to obtain subtitle URLs.

required_parameters.name: subtitleUrl
required_parameters.description: Subtitle URL of a YouTube video. To get this, please call `Video > Get Video Details` first.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Subtitle format. Defaults to `srt`.

optional_parameters.name: fixOverlap
optional_parameters.description: Whether to fix overlapping subtitles. Defaults to `true`. Useful for auto-generated subtitles.

optional_parameters.name: targetLang
optional_parameters.description: Target language (ISO-639 code) into which the subtitle will be translated. Leave blank to preserve the original language. Unsupported code will **fallback** to the original language.

api_list.name: Translate, Convert, Download Subtitle
api_list.description: This endpoint lets you translate, convert and download a subtitle of a YouTube video. Before doing this, please call endpoint `Video > Get Video Details` to obtain subtitle URLs.

required_parameters.name: subtitleUrl
required_parameters.description: Subtitle URL of a YouTube video. To get this, please call `Video > Get Video Details` first.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Subtitle format. Defaults to `srt`.

optional_parameters.name: fixOverlap
optional_parameters.description: Whether to fix overlapping subtitles. Defaults to `true`. Useful for auto-generated subtitles.

optional_parameters.name: targetLang
optional_parameters.description: Target language (ISO-639 code) into which the subtitle will be translated. Leave blank to preserve the original language. Unsupported code will **fallback** to the original language.

api_list.name: Translate, Convert, Download Subtitle
api_list.description: This endpoint lets you translate, convert and download a subtitle of a YouTube video. Before doing this, please call endpoint `Video > Get Video Details` to obtain subtitle URLs.

required_parameters.name: subtitleUrl
required_parameters.description: Subtitle URL of a YouTube video. To get this, please call `Video > Get Video Details` first.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Subtitle format. Defaults to `srt`.

optional_parameters.name: fixOverlap
optional_parameters.description: Whether to fix overlapping subtitles. Defaults to `true`. Useful for auto-generated subtitles.

optional_parameters.name: targetLang
optional_parameters.description: Target language (ISO-639 code) into which the subtitle will be translated. Leave blank to preserve the original language. Unsupported code will **fallback** to the original language.
